user_query: I'm writing an article about the impact of climate change on wildlife. Can you provide me with news articles specifically from a well-known newspaper that covers climate change? It would be helpful if I can get the articles in different languages to gather a comprehensive understanding.

TaskList.description: Search for a reputable newspaper that regularly publishes articles on climate change.
Fetch the latest articles about the impact of climate change on wildlife from the identified newspaper.
Translate the articles into different languages to gather a comprehensive understanding.
Compile the translated articles into a single document or folder for easy reference.
